Title: Relates to the interagency coordinating committee on rural public transportation, and transportation of eligible persons residing in a rural area
Summary: Relates to the appointees to the interagency coordinating committee on rural public transportation, and transportation of eligible persons residing in a rural area.
LawCode: Amd ยง73-d, Transp L; amd ยง365-h, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the transportation law, in relation to the interagency coordinating committee on rural public transportation; and to amend the social services law, in relation to the transportation of eligible persons residing in a rural area
